title: Chemistry Break - Minimal house/techno syrpa
text:
Eitthvað sem ég var að hnoða saman. Minimal techno og electro house í bland, vona að ykkur geðjist niðurstaðan.
http://130.208.227.244/online/DJsets/ChemistryBreak-26.05.07.mp3
PS: Biðst sérstaklega afsökunar á fyrstu skiptingunni :)
00:00 David K - Tender and Sugar (original Mix)
04:20 Minilogue - The Girl from Botany Bay (Original Mix)
09:30 Stephan Bodzin - Kerosene
14:30 Eric Prydz Pres. Pryda - Armed
20:10 Minilogue - Ahck (Kab Remix)
23:50 Trentemoller - Moan (Radio Slave's Mix for K)
30:20 Arno Cost & Arias - Magenta (Original Mix)
34:20 Lifelike & Chris Menace - Discopolis
39:40 Booka Shade - Tickle
46:00 Dondolo - Dragon (Shit Robot Remix)
51:00 Selway & Vincenzo - Dream Stealer (Joel Mull Remix)
55:40 Eric Prydz pres. Pryda - Rymd
62:30 Claude von Stroke - Who's afraid of Detroit (Stanton Warriors Remix)
66:45 Infusion - Better World (Josh Wink Remix)
73:30 Slok - Lonely Child (Satoshi Tomiie 3D Remix)
